oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Magnetic properties of Pr1-xSr1+xMnO4 (0.3 <= x <= 0.8) single crystals
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: TOMY, CV
KUMAR, R
BALAKRISHNAN, G
LEES, MR
PAUL, DM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: charge
la0.5sr1.5mno4
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We report the magnetic properties of Pr1-xSr1+xMnO4 single crystals in the composition range 0.3 less than or equal to x less than or equal to 0.8. All the compositions studied show highly anisotropic spin-glass type magnetic ordering at low temperatures. Some of the compositions (x > 0.6) exhibit a broad maximum in the magnetic susceptibility above 100 K, highlighting the 2D magnetic interactions in these compounds. A possible charge ordering transition is observed around 265 K for the x = 0.8 compound.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: ACTA PHYSICA POLONICA B, JAGELLONIAN UNIV, INST PHYSICS
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Conference on Strongly Correlated Electron Systems (SCES 2002),KRAKOW, POLAND,JUL 10-13, 2002
